original: des na gtso bo yin pa'i phyir skul ba nyid nges sbyor yin no zhes dogs pa bsu nas ;
analyzed: des na gtso bo yin pa'i phyir skul ba nyid nges sbyor yin no zhes dogs pa bsu nas ;
translated: Therefore, since it is the principal one, it is the instigator that is the definite application.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis lan btab pa ni rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis lan btab pa ni rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The reply to this qualm with another verse is easy to understand.üîΩThe summary is:

original: gnyis kyi dang po bzhi pa yis //
analyzed: gnyis kyi dang po bzhi pa yis //
translated: The first of the two, the fourth,

original: dgu pa de nas bzhi rnams kyis //
analyzed: dgu pa de nas bzhi rnams kyis //
translated: The ninth, then the four,

original: lnga pa dang ni drug pa bsal //
analyzed: lnga pa dang ni drug pa bsal //
translated: The fifth and sixth are eliminated.

original: gzhan pa dag ni gsum pas bzlog / ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan pa dag ni gsum pas bzlog / ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: The others are refuted by the third.

original: 'khrul 'khor la gnas sogs mi @245a * //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor la gnas sogs mi @245a * //
translated: The words ‚Äúnot deviating from the basis of the machine, etc.‚Äù

original: 'gyur ; / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sun 'byin bstan pa'i don du /üîΩnges sbyor rtogs pa nyid yin 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gyur ; / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sun 'byin bstan pa'i don du / nges sbyor rtogs pa nyid yin 'gyur //
translated: are for the purpose of teaching the refutation that will be explained.üîΩThe words ‚Äúthe definite application would be the very understanding‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kyang /üîΩtshad ma'i rang bzhin bsam pa 'phangs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kyang / tshad ma'i rang bzhin bsam pa 'phangs pa'i phyir na /
translated: alsoüîΩimplicate the nature of valid knowledge.

original: tha ma'i rnam pa rtog pa brgyad po sun 'byin pa ston par byed pa ni /
analyzed: tha ma'i rnam pa rtog pa brgyad po sun 'byin pa ston par byed pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the final eight types of conceptualization are shown to be the refutation.

original: gal te nges sbyor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skyes bu'i don la mkho ba'i nges sbyor ni gdon mi za bar tshad ma'am gzhal bya gcig gi khongs su 'du dgos so //
analyzed: gal te nges sbyor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skyes bu'i don la mkho ba'i nges sbyor ni gdon mi za bar tshad ma'am gzhal bya gcig gi khongs su 'du dgos so //
translated: If one says that the ‚Äúapplication‚Äù in ‚Äúapplication of the term‚Äù is necessarily included in either a valid cognition or an object of comprehension.

original: de la gal te nges sbyor dag gi don yin na /
analyzed: de la gal te nges sbyor dag gi don yin na /
translated: If it is the object of the application,

original: de'i tshe dam bcas pa tsam gyis nges sbyor gyi tshad ma'i skyabs btsal dogs na /
analyzed: de'i tshe dam bcas pa tsam gyis nges sbyor gyi tshad ma'i skyabs btsal dogs na /
translated: then, fearing that the ‚Äúapplication‚Äù of the valid cognition would be sought by mere assertion,

original: de la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni nus pa med de mchod sbyin gyis shig ces bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i don ston pa tsam du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni nus pa med de mchod sbyin gyis shig ces bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i don ston pa tsam du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: direct perception and inference are not capable of it, because the mere indication of a future object is observed in ‚ÄúSacrifice with an animal.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgra las byung ba yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgra las byung ba yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason, verbal testimony is not a valid cognition,

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the thing is not perceived.

original: snang na ni da ltar ba nyid du 'gyur bas mi 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang na ni da ltar ba nyid du 'gyur bas mi 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were perceived, then it would be present, and it would follow that it would not be applied.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma ci zhig yin par 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma ci zhig yin par 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is said, ‚ÄúWhat would a valid cognition be?‚Äù

original: des na tshad ma med pa'i phyir gzhal bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: des na tshad ma med pa'i phyir gzhal bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because there is no valid cognition, the conceptualization of the object of comprehension is refuted.

original: 'o na nges sbyor tshad mar gyur pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'o na nges sbyor tshad mar gyur pa nyid yin no //
translated: Well, then, the nature of the ascertainment-unification is valid cognition.

original: tshad ma la yang tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma la yang tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And also, with regard to valid cognition, it is not understood by another valid cognition.

original: nges sbyor tshad ma'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: nges sbyor tshad ma'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: The nature of the ascertainment-unification is valid cognition.

original: ces smos so //
analyzed: ces smos so //
translated: This is what is said.

original: nges par sbyor bha zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yul gyis 'dzin byed du ni rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: nges par sbyor bha zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yul gyis 'dzin byed du ni rtogs pa med do //
translated: There is no understanding of the ascertainment-unification as a certain apprehension of the object.

original: gal te yang skyes bu'i byed pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa 'phangs pa de lta na yang byed pa yul nyid du 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te yang skyes bu'i byed pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa 'phangs pa de lta na yang byed pa yul nyid du 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: And even if the apprehension of the person's activity, etc. is implied, still the activity is not apprehended as the object;

original: 'on kyang shugs kyis 'phangs pa yin no //üîΩdbang po bzhin du byed pa la sogs pa'i blo skyes pa las tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin no ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang shugs kyis 'phangs pa yin no // dbang po bzhin du byed pa la sogs pa'i blo skyes pa las tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin no ste /
translated: rather, it is implied by force.

original: dbang po tshad ma nyid yin pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po tshad ma nyid yin pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the cognition of activity, etc. is not valid cognition, just like the sense faculties, because the validity of the sense faculties has been refuted.

original: 'di ni tshad ma'i rnam par rtog pa bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma'i rnam par rtog pa bkag pa yin no //
translated: This is the refutation of the conceptualization of valid cognition.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gnyi ga'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa yang rtsol ba gzhan la mi ltos par bkag pa grub po //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gnyi ga'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa yang rtsol ba gzhan la mi ltos par bkag pa grub po //
translated: Therefore, the refutation of the concept of both is established without depending on any other effort.

original: skyes bu dang don la nye bar mkho ba'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir gnyi ga ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang mi srid do //
analyzed: skyes bu dang don la nye bar mkho ba'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir gnyi ga ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang mi srid do //
translated: The concept of neither is also impossible, because it is governed by the needs of people and the meaning.

original: des na de ltar tshigs su bcad pa @245b 'dis ni rnam par rtog pa bzhi ka yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar tshigs su bcad pa @245b 'dis ni rnam par rtog pa bzhi ka yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, this verse excludes all four concepts.

original: lhag ma bsal ba ni sgra'i byed pa las skyes bu'i byed pa zhes 'jug pa'i rim pa yin yang /
analyzed: lhag ma bsal ba ni sgra'i byed pa las skyes bu'i byed pa zhes 'jug pa'i rim pa yin yang /
translated: The exclusion of the remainder is the order of the application of the terms.

original: nges sbyor zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nges sbyor zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term ‚Äúdefinite application‚Äù

original: 'jig rten nges par sbyar bya'i chos nyid rab tu grags so //
analyzed: 'jig rten nges par sbyar bya'i chos nyid rab tu grags so //
translated: is well known as the nature of the phenomenon to be definitely applied in the world.

original: srid pa tsam gyi ni nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: srid pa tsam gyi ni nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is a phenomenon that definitely applies to mere existence.

original: de'i dbang gis skyes bu'i byed pa nyid yin par ston to //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis skyes bu'i byed pa nyid yin par ston to //
translated: Therefore, it shows that the application of the term is due to the power of that.

original: gal te sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su brjod pa'i ngag gi nang du 'dus pa skyes bu'i byed pa'i sgra dang / skyes bu ni byed pa de zhes bya ba la zlos par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su brjod pa'i ngag gi nang du 'dus pa skyes bu'i byed pa'i sgra dang / skyes bu ni byed pa de zhes bya ba la zlos par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the words of the statement ‚ÄúThe operation, etc.‚Äù are included in the statement, then the words expressing the operation of a person, and the words ‚ÄúThe person is the operation‚Äù would not be redundant.

original: ngag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrjod byed gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ngag tha dad pa'i phyir ro // rjod byed gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because they are different statements.üîΩThe words are different.

original: nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'di'i ni tshig gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'di'i ni tshig gzhan nyid do //
translated: The words ‚ÄúThe operation‚Äù are just another way of saying ‚Äúof this.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe bsgom pa'i phyogs kyi skyon nyid du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe bsgom pa'i phyogs kyi skyon nyid du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: At that time, the fault of the side of meditation is intended.

original: da ni sgra'i byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa sun 'byin par byed pa ni /
analyzed: da ni sgra'i byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa sun 'byin par byed pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to refute the conception of the operation of sound, he says,

original: ngag gi byed pa'i phyogs la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi byed pa'i phyogs la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of the side of the operation of speech,‚Äù and so on.

original: yang gzhan dag gang la sgra'i byed par 'dod ce na /
analyzed: yang gzhan dag gang la sgra'i byed par 'dod ce na /
translated: Again, others ask, ‚ÄúWhat is the operation of sound?‚Äù

original: gzhan gyis brjod pa nyid 'dri bar byed pa ni ngag gi byed pa'i phyogs la ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis brjod pa nyid 'dri bar byed pa ni ngag gi byed pa'i phyogs la ni /
translated: The questioner himself states, ‚ÄúIn the case of the side of the operation of speech,‚Äù

original: sgra yi sgom par der 'gyur te //
analyzed: sgra yi sgom par der 'gyur te //
translated: ‚ÄúMeditation on sound would be that,

original: sgra yi bdag nyid byed par brjod //
analyzed: sgra yi bdag nyid byed par brjod //
translated: Because the operation is said to be the nature of sound.‚Äù

original: ling nga la sogs gzhan yin no ;üîΩ/ zhes bya pa'i sgra'i bdag ni rang bzhin te /
analyzed: ling nga la sogs gzhan yin no ; / zhes bya pa'i sgra'i bdag ni rang bzhin te /
translated: and the other is the nominal base.üîΩThe nature of the nominal base is the nature of the root.

original: de'i sgom pa ni bskul ba'i rang bzhin te de brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgom pa ni bskul ba'i rang bzhin te de brjod pa yin no //
translated: The expression of that is the expression of the root.

original: gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The other is the nominal affix.

original: chos shig mchod sbyin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtag tu rtogs bzhin pa skyes bu'i byed pa tsam la tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: chos shig mchod sbyin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtag tu rtogs bzhin pa skyes bu'i byed pa tsam la tha dad pa yin no //
translated: The nominal affix is the mere action of the person, which is always understood, in such expressions as ‚ÄúDevadatta sacrifices a cow.‚Äù

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And thus:

original: kun don bshad pa thams cad la //
analyzed: kun don bshad pa thams cad la //
translated: In all explanations of the meaning of all words,

original: yod pa 'di ni gzhan yin no //
analyzed: yod pa 'di ni gzhan yin no //
translated: this existence is the other.

original: zhes 'dri bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes 'dri bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the nominal affix is asked.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni lota dang krita kyi rkyen la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni lota dang krita kyi rkyen la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the krt and taddhita nominal affixes.

original: sgra'i byed pa yongs sbyor du khas len na ni de'i phyogs la 'gyur ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa yongs sbyor du khas len na ni de'i phyogs la 'gyur ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: If one accepts the function of the word in the compound, then the fault of the change of case would occur in that system.

original: nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa na //
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa na //
translated: He thinks that another fault should be stated.

original: de ni sgra nyid la 'gyur pas //
analyzed: de ni sgra nyid la 'gyur pas //
translated: That would be only the word,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: de ni'i sgra ni dang gi don nam khyad par gyi don to //
analyzed: de ni'i sgra ni dang gi don nam khyad par gyi don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù has the sense of ‚Äúand‚Äù or ‚Äúspecifically.üîΩ‚Äù

original: 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the specific point:

original: nges sbyor ni bdag grub par bya ba'i don du 'jug par byed pa yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: nges sbyor ni bdag grub par bya ba'i don du 'jug par byed pa yin par 'dod do //
translated: it is asserted that the application is engaged for the sake of establishing the self.

original: gang gi tshe @246a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe @246a * //
translated: When

original: sgra'i byed pa ngag gi don du gyur pa na /
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa ngag gi don du gyur pa na /
translated: the function of the word becomes the meaning of the sentence,

original: nges sbyor du 'dod pa de'i tshe des bdag nyid grub pa'i don du skyes bu gzhag par bya dgos na /
analyzed: nges sbyor du 'dod pa de'i tshe des bdag nyid grub pa'i don du skyes bu gzhag par bya dgos na /
translated: at that time, since it is asserted that the application is for the sake of establishing the self, it would be necessary to posit a person for the sake of establishing the self.

original: sgra'i byed pa de ni sgra'i nyid las grub pas na skyes bu 'jug par byed par mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa de ni sgra'i nyid las grub pas na skyes bu 'jug par byed par mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since that function of the word is established from the word itself, it is not tenable that the person is engaged. This is the point.

original: gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni //üîΩgal te sgra yis ma bskul bar //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni // gal te sgra yis ma bskul bar //
translated: Anticipating another‚Äôs qualm, he says:üîΩIf the person engages in his own action

original: rang gi bya ba la 'jug na //
analyzed: rang gi bya ba la 'jug na //
translated: without being urged by the word

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúsacrifice,‚ÄùüîΩthen what is the point of the word ‚Äúsacrifice‚Äù?

original: mchod sbyin gyis shig ces bya ba'i sgras ni bdag nyid kyis bya ba'i rgyu mtshan du skyes bu bskul ba ni ma yin la /
analyzed: mchod sbyin gyis shig ces bya ba'i sgras ni bdag nyid kyis bya ba'i rgyu mtshan du skyes bu bskul ba ni ma yin la /
translated: The word ‚Äúsacrifice‚Äù does not urge the person to be the reason for the action.

original: der 'jug pa ni ma yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: der 'jug pa ni ma yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is not that it engages in that.

original: 'o na gang du 'jug ce na //
analyzed: 'o na gang du 'jug ce na //
translated: But if it does not engage in itself, in what does it engage?

original: rang gi bya ba la 'jug na //
analyzed: rang gi bya ba la 'jug na //
translated: If it engages in its own activity,

original: zhes so // skyes bu rang gi bya ba la 'jug na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes so // skyes bu rang gi bya ba la 'jug na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that the person engages in his own activity.

original: 'di la rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di la rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /
translated: Here there are two alternatives.

original: rang gi bya ba de la yang sgras bskul ba'am ma yin na /
analyzed: rang gi bya ba de la yang sgras bskul ba'am ma yin na /
translated: If the person is urged to his own activity by speech,

original: ma yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la 'di ni ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyed dang po lhag ma'i phyogs la ni phyed phyi ma'o //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la 'di ni ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyed dang po lhag ma'i phyogs la ni phyed phyi ma'o //
translated: then in the alternative that he is not, the first half of the verse is for the first half of the alternative, and the second half of the verse is for the second half of the alternative.

original: dmigs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: It would be without an object.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe /
translated: At that time,

original: de'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not have the activity of that.

original: 'di nyid kyis ni gnyi ga'i byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni gnyi ga'i byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: By this very argument, the alternative that the person has the nature of both is also refuted.

original: gnyi ga'i bya ba dang bral ba'i rnam par rtog pa yang dogs pa mi bya ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bya ba dang bral ba'i rnam par rtog pa yang dogs pa mi bya ste /
translated: But the alternative that the person is devoid of both activities should not be doubted,

original: de tsam gyis kyang nges sbyor gyi don thob pas ni /
analyzed: de tsam gyis kyang nges sbyor gyi don thob pas ni /
translated: because the meaning of the compound ‚Äúnon-engagement‚Äù is obtained by that much.

original: 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no engagement.

original: de ltar rnam par rtog pa brgyad ka bsal nas brjod ma thag pa'i dmigs pa med pa nyid 'khrul 'khor la gnas pa la sogs pa lhag ma gsum la bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog pa brgyad ka bsal nas brjod ma thag pa'i dmigs pa med pa nyid 'khrul 'khor la gnas pa la sogs pa lhag ma gsum la bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having thus eliminated the eight kinds of conceptualization, in order to demonstrate the absence of the referent object to the remaining three, the wheel of error and so on, he says,

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Just so, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba'i dogs pa thugs la bzhag nas de'i don du 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba'i dogs pa thugs la bzhag nas de'i don du 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Having raised the doubt, Why is that? he says, For this reason, etc.

original: 'o na mnyan par dmigs pa med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mnyan par dmigs pa med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can listening be without a referent object?

original: 'brel byed ces gsungs /
analyzed: 'brel byed ces gsungs /
translated: It is connected, etc.üîΩWhy is it not connected?

original: ci'i phyir 'brel pa med ce na /üîΩspyad bya'i bdag ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'brel pa med ce na / spyad bya'i bdag ces gsungs so //
translated: The self is not the object of experience, etc.üîΩAt that time is the time of understanding the meaning of the words.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni ngag gi don rtogs pa'i dus na'o //üîΩlongs spyod par bya ba'i bdag nyid mtho ris kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir skyes bu de la gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni ngag gi don rtogs pa'i dus na'o // longs spyod par bya ba'i bdag nyid mtho ris kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir skyes bu de la gnas pa ma yin no //

original: spyad bya'i bdag nyid mi srid pa nyid ci ltar zhe na /

analyzed: de'i tshe grub pa nyid yin pas na bsgrub bya nyid nyams so zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de la sgra'i sgom pa ni zhes bya ba nas sgom pa yin la zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sgra'i sgom pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la sgra'i sgom pa ni zhes bya ba nas sgom pa yin la zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni sgra'i sgom pa bstan pa'o //
translated: The passage from ‚ÄúThe meditation on sound‚Äù up to ‚Äúis meditation‚Äù teaches the meditation on sound.

original: skyes bu'i zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu'i zhes bya bas ni don gyi sgom pa bstan to //
analyzed: skyes bu'i zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu'i zhes bya bas ni don gyi sgom pa bstan to //
translated: The passage from ‚Äúthe person‚Äù up to ‚Äúthe result‚Äù teaches the meditation on the object.

original: khams kyi don ni mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: khams kyi don ni mchod sbyin no //
translated: The meaning of the element is the sacrifice.

original: 'bras bu ni mtho ris so //üîΩspyir mi 'thad pa nyid du dam bcas nas /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni mtho ris so // spyir mi 'thad pa nyid du dam bcas nas /
translated: The result is heaven.üîΩHaving generally stated the untenability of the meditation on sound,

original: re zhig sgra'i sgom pa sun dbyung ba brjod pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig sgra'i sgom pa sun dbyung ba brjod pa ni /
translated: the refutation of the meditation on sound is stated.

original: sgra'i byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The passage beginning with ‚ÄúThe function of sound‚Äù

original: sgra'i sgom pa ngag gi don du khas len na ni /
analyzed: sgra'i sgom pa ngag gi don du khas len na ni /
translated: If one accepts the meditation on sound as the meaning of speech,

original: brjod byar 'gyur ba'i phyir sgra rjod byed du khas blang bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: brjod byar 'gyur ba'i phyir sgra rjod byed du khas blang bar 'gyur la /
translated: then one would accept sound as the expression because it is the expressed.

original: bya ba khas blangs na yang sgra byed pa por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba khas blangs na yang sgra byed pa por 'gyur ro //
translated: And if one accepts the function, then sound would be the agent.

original: rjod byed dang / byed pa po dag kyang phan tshun mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad do //
analyzed: rjod byed dang / byed pa po dag kyang phan tshun mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad do //
translated: And it is untenable that the expression and the agent are mutually dependent, because they are not compatible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de la ltos te zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de la ltos te zhes gsungs te /
translated: For that very reason, it says ‚Äúin dependence on that.‚Äù

original: sgra'i byed pa la ltos te'o //
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa la ltos te'o //
translated: in dependence on the function of the word.

original: ci ste zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: ci ste zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is the opponent‚Äôs opinion.

original: byed pa po nyid kyis 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni re zhig spang bar dka' ba'o //üîΩbrjod par bya ba nyid kyang dngos su ma yin mod rtogs @247a * //
analyzed: byed pa po nyid kyis 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni re zhig spang bar dka' ba'o // brjod par bya ba nyid kyang dngos su ma yin mod rtogs @247a * //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is difficult to abandon‚Äù the idea that the effect is the agent itself.

original: par bya ba tsam du ni mi 'thad pa med do zhes byed pa'o //
analyzed: par bya ba tsam du ni mi 'thad pa med do zhes byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven though it is not the object of expression,‚Äù it is not impossible that it is merely the object of understanding.

original: don 'di nyid ston par byed pa ni /
analyzed: don 'di nyid ston par byed pa ni /
translated: This is the point.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way‚Äù and so on.

original: bdag ni sgra 'dis 'di las nges par sbyor ro snyam du rtogs pas na /
analyzed: bdag ni sgra 'dis 'di las nges par sbyor ro snyam du rtogs pas na /
translated: Since one understands that ‚ÄúI am connected to this object by this word,‚Äù

original: brjod bya nyid ma yin yang nga'i nges par sbyor ba ni 'di'i byed pa yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir na sgra'i byed pa ni rtogs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: brjod bya nyid ma yin yang nga'i nges par sbyor ba ni 'di'i byed pa yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir na sgra'i byed pa ni rtogs pa kho na'o //
translated: even though it is not the object of expression, one understands that ‚Äúmy connection is its function.‚Äù Therefore the function of the word is just the understanding.

original: gal te sgras bdag nyid nges par sbyor bar rtogs na de'i tshe nges par sbyor ba nyid dag gi don du thal gyi /
analyzed: gal te sgras bdag nyid nges par sbyor bar rtogs na de'i tshe nges par sbyor ba nyid dag gi don du thal gyi /
translated: If one understands that the word itself is connected to the object, then it follows that the connection itself is the meaning of the word,

original: sgom pa ni ma yin no zhes dogs na /
analyzed: sgom pa ni ma yin no zhes dogs na /
translated: but it is not the object of expression.

original: nges par sbyor ba'ang zhes smos te sgom pa nyid nges par sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba'ang zhes smos te sgom pa nyid nges par sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The word necessarily is also added, meaning that the very meditation is the necessary connection.

original: phyed phyi ma tsam zhig rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: phyed phyi ma tsam zhig rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The latter half is explained:

original: sgra'i sgom pa nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i sgom pa nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meditation on sound, etc.

original: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pa ste /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pa ste /
translated: That is not so, etc. is the refutation.

original: gal te sgra'i byed pa sgra las rtogs pa yin na zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gal te sgra'i byed pa sgra las rtogs pa yin na zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: If the function of sound is understood from sound, etc. is the remainder.

original: sgra'i byed pa nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba skyes bu'i sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin na /
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba skyes bu'i sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin na /
translated: If the function of sound is the necessary connection, which is the characteristic of the human agent,

original: de'i tshe brda ma bzung bas ci ltar mi rtogs te /
analyzed: de'i tshe brda ma bzung bas ci ltar mi rtogs te /
translated: then how is it not understood without grasping the convention?

original: sgra'i byed pa zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The function of sound should be understood as sound.

original: de bzhin du nges par sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba yang sgra nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin du nges par sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba yang sgra nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Similarly, the necessary connection is also the nature of sound itself, which is the meaning of sound.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is clarified by by its own nature, etc.

original: de nyid tshogs pa yin na zhe na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid tshogs pa yin na zhe na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
translated: If you say that it is the collection itself, this is the opponent‚Äôs doubt.

original: long ba'i tshig yin no snyam du bsams nas gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: long ba'i tshig yin no snyam du bsams nas gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thinking that this is the talk of a blind man, he says ‚ÄúIf‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ltar 'bras bu gang la tshogs pa skyabs yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'bras bu gang la tshogs pa skyabs yin te /
translated: In this way, for what effect is the collection the cause?

original: skul ba la sogs pa la 'on te brda'i spyod yul du gyur pa'i don rtogs pas na /
analyzed: skul ba la sogs pa la 'on te brda'i spyod yul du gyur pa'i don rtogs pas na /
translated: If it is the cause of the understanding of the meaning that is the domain of convention,üîΩthen, because of the understanding of the meaning that is the domain of convention,

original: de la nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyogs dang po ni ma yin pa'i phyir na gnyis pa la gnas par 'gyur ba na /
analyzed: de la nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyogs dang po ni ma yin pa'i phyir na gnyis pa la gnas par 'gyur ba na /
translated: the second is the case, not the first.

original: sgra'i byed pa bdag nyid skyes bu'i sgom pa ni rtogs pa ma yin no zhes ston pa ni ;
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa bdag nyid skyes bu'i sgom pa ni rtogs pa ma yin no zhes ston pa ni ;
translated: To show that the activity of sound is not the instigation of a person, he says,

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause‚Äù and so on.

original: brda dang lhan cig pa yin yang sgras skyes bu nan gyis 'jug par mi byed kyi /
analyzed: brda dang lhan cig pa yin yang sgras skyes bu nan gyis 'jug par mi byed kyi /
translated: Even though it is together with the convention, sound does not instigate a person.

original: 'on kyang don rtogs nas rang nyid 'dod pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: 'on kyang don rtogs nas rang nyid 'dod pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa'am /
translated: However, after the understanding of the meaning, he engages by the power of his own desire,

original: mi 'jug pa yang rag go //
analyzed: mi 'jug pa yang rag go //
translated: or he does not engage.

original: 'o na brda 'dzin pa'i tshogs pa gang du dogs @247b she na ;
analyzed: 'o na brda 'dzin pa'i tshogs pa gang du dogs @247b she na ;
translated: Now, in what collection of words is there doubt?

original: brda 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: brda 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn the collection of words that expresses a meaning,‚Äù etc.

original: don ni skul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: don ni skul ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The meaning is characterized by urging, requesting, etc.

original: 'o na ji ltar skyes bu 'jug ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar skyes bu 'jug ce na /
translated: Now, how does a person engage?

original: don rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni zhes smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúA person who understands the meaning,‚Äù etc.

original: phyed snga ma 'brel ba ni /
analyzed: phyed snga ma 'brel ba ni /
translated: The first half of the verse is the connection.

original: 'di gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: 'di gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
translated: It is ‚ÄúDo this,‚Äù etc.

original: / skul pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa dag kho nar rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: / skul pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa dag kho nar rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Urging and requesting are understood,

original: sgom pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nges sbyor ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgom pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nges sbyor ni ma yin te /
translated: but not the connection characterized by meditation,

original: brda 'dzin pa'i tshogs pa'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: brda 'dzin pa'i tshogs pa'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: because the collection of words does not have the function of expressing that. This is the meaning.

original: nges par sbyor nyid ces bya ba rtogs par 'dod pas ni gdon mi za bar skul ba dang gsol ba 'debs pa rtogs par khas blang dgos so //
analyzed: nges par sbyor nyid ces bya ba rtogs par 'dod pas ni gdon mi za bar skul ba dang gsol ba 'debs pa rtogs par khas blang dgos so //
translated: One who desires to understand the connection itself must certainly accept the understanding of urging and requesting.

original: de lta na yang rang gi 'dod pa kho nas skyes bu 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang rang gi 'dod pa kho nas skyes bu 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Nevertheless, a person is engaged by his own desire alone.

original: des na sgra ni 'jug par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'phangs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra ni 'jug par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'phangs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word is not understood to be the engaging itself.

original: nges par sbyor ba nyid rtogs pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa nyid kyang yin no zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba nyid rtogs pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa nyid kyang yin no zhes ston pa ni /
translated: This understanding of the engaging itself is also shown to be non-apprehending.

original: nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The passage beginning with ‚ÄúThe engaging itself‚Äù shows this.

original: nges par sbyor ba po zhes bya ba ni skyes bus byas pa la ltos nas ni byed pa po yin la /
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba po zhes bya ba ni skyes bus byas pa la ltos nas ni byed pa po yin la /
translated: The ‚Äúengaging itself‚Äù is the agent in relation to the human effort,

original: skyes bus ma byas pa las ltos na ni 'chad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa las ltos na ni 'chad par byed pa'o //
translated: and the expounder in relation to the non-human effort.

original: rtogs par byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: rtogs par byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving understood‚Äù means that it is the cause of the arising,

original: rnam par rtogs pas brtags nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par rtogs pas brtags nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and thus it has the meaning of ‚Äúhaving investigated with conceptualization.‚Äù

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni nges par sbyar bya'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni nges par sbyar bya'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the engaging.

original: nges par sbyar ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sgra'i byed pa'i nges sbyor ro //üîΩnges par sbyor bar byed pa po'i rtogs pa dmigs pa med par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: nges par sbyar ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sgra'i byed pa'i nges sbyor ro // nges par sbyor bar byed pa po'i rtogs pa dmigs pa med par 'gyur mod /
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe application will be fruitless‚Äù is a grammatical rule.üîΩGranted that the cognition of the one who applies is without an object,

original: nges par sbyar bar bya ba'i rtogs pa go ji ltar dmigs pa med par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: nges par sbyar bar bya ba'i rtogs pa go ji ltar dmigs pa med par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: but how can the cognition of the one to whom the application is made be without an object?

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The reply is ‚ÄúJust as . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe word ‚Äúthere‚Äù refers to the application itself.

original: der zhes bya ba ni nges sbyor nyid la'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni nges sbyor nyid la'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe application is just like that‚Äù

original: sbyar bar bya ba de bzhin te //üîΩzhes bya ba ni gnod pa'i rtogs pa can nyid du'o //
analyzed: sbyar bar bya ba de bzhin te // zhes bya ba ni gnod pa'i rtogs pa can nyid du'o //
translated: means that the cognition of the one to whom the application is made is just like the cognition of the one who applies.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚Äù

original: sgra ni blo don rjod byed yin //
analyzed: sgra ni blo don rjod byed yin //
translated: means that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.üîΩThe expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni snang ba la ltos nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snang ba la ltos nas /
translated: means that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.

original: blo'i rnam pa yul yin no //
analyzed: blo'i rnam pa yul yin no //
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚ÄùüîΩmeans that the word is the means of understanding the object in dependence on the appearance of the word.

original: lhag par zhen pa la ltos nas ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don yul yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: lhag par zhen pa la ltos nas ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don yul yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe word is the means of understanding the object‚Äù

original: yul med pa kho na'o //üîΩci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: yul med pa kho na'o //üîΩci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: means that the word is

original: @248a * // rab tu sbyor bar byed pa'i rab tu sbyor byed nyid du rtogs pa ni rtogs par bya bas gnod pas dmigs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: @248a * // rab tu sbyor bar byed pa'i rab tu sbyor byed nyid du rtogs pa ni rtogs par bya bas gnod pas dmigs pa med pa yin no //
translated: The understanding of the agent as the agent of the action is undermined by the object of understanding, and so it is non-apprehensible.

original: ci ltar de gnod ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar de gnod ce na /
translated: How is it undermined?

original: rang gi bya bas stong par bdag nyid rtogs par gsungs so //
analyzed: rang gi bya bas stong par bdag nyid rtogs par gsungs so //
translated: It is said that the self is understood to be empty of its own action.

original: de bzhin du sbyar bya'i rtogs pa yang gnod do zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar bya'i rtogs pa yang gnod do zhes 'brel to //
translated: In the same way, the understanding of the object of action is undermined.

original: gang gis gnod ce na /
analyzed: gang gis gnod ce na /
translated: By what is it undermined?

original: de nyid kyis zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said that it is undermined by that very thing.

original: sbyar bar bya ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: sbyar bar bya ba nyid kyis so //
translated: By the object of action itself.

original: ci ltar des gnod ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar des gnod ce na /
translated: How is it undermined by that?

original: bdag nyid rang bya ba dang mi ldan par rtogs pas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bdag nyid rang bya ba dang mi ldan par rtogs pas zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said that the self is understood to be devoid of its own action.

original: des na byed par rtogs pa ni yul med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na byed par rtogs pa ni yul med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the understanding of the agent is indeed non-apprehensible.

original: 'dir gzhan gyis de'i rtogs pa de ni sgra las yin no zhe na zhes smras so //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyis de'i rtogs pa de ni sgra las yin no zhe na zhes smras so //
translated: Here, the opponent says that its understanding is from the word.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: mngon sum gyis byed pa ma rtogs tsam gyis ni gnod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis byed pa ma rtogs tsam gyis ni gnod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not undermined merely by the non-understanding of the agent by perception,

original: sgra nyid las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra nyid las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is understood from the word itself.

original: mngon sum gyis ma rtogs pa'i me rjes su dpag pas kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ma rtogs pa'i me rjes su dpag pas kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not the case that what is not realized by perception is not realized by inference.

original: lan du de ni med de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lan du de ni med de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúThat is not so,‚Äù and so on.

original: gal te mngon sum bzhin du sgra las kyang /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum bzhin du sgra las kyang /
translated: If, like perception, sound also

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo snang ba yin na /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo snang ba yin na /
translated: illuminated its own nature,

original: de'i tshe dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis nyes par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de'i tshe dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis nyes par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then at that time, because of the characteristic of the absence of an object, there would be no fault.

original: 'on kyang rjes su dpag pa ltar sgra de yang blo'i don nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rjes su dpag pa ltar sgra de yang blo'i don nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: However, like inference, that sound also clarifies the meaning of the mind.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag gi de ltar zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bdag gi de ltar zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is stated, ‚ÄúFor me, it is like this.‚Äù

original: gzhan gsal ba'i rnam pa nye bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gsal ba'i rnam pa nye bar ston pa'o //
translated: It shows the aspect of clarifying others.

original: rnam par dpyod pa rnams kyis gsal ba la ltos nas phyogs gzhan bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa rnams kyis gsal ba la ltos nas phyogs gzhan bshad pa ni /
translated: Those who analyze explain another position,

original: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with ‚ÄúOr else.‚Äù

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni nges par sbyor byed kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni nges par sbyor byed kyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOf this‚Äù refers to the one who is engaged.

original: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni nges par sbyar byas so //
analyzed: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni nges par sbyar byas so //
translated: The phrase by me is added to indicate that the author is the speaker.

original: bsgom pa la ltos nas kyang rnam 'grel dang sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: bsgom pa la ltos nas kyang rnam 'grel dang sbyor bar byed do //
translated: The phrase in dependence upon meditation is added to indicate that the author is the composer.

original: gang la smra ba po yod pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'i lung la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: gang la smra ba po yod pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'i lung la sogs pa la'o //
translated: The phrase where there is a speaker refers to the scriptures of the Buddhists, etc.

original: gang la de med pa zhes bya ba ni rig byed la'o //üîΩ'di ni grags pa ji lta ba bzhin sbyar ba yin te /
analyzed: gang la de med pa zhes bya ba ni rig byed la'o // 'di ni grags pa ji lta ba bzhin sbyar ba yin te /
translated: The phrase where there is not refers to the Vedas.

original: tshad ma la ltos nas ni /
analyzed: tshad ma la ltos nas ni /
translated: This is the way in which the author uses the terms in accordance with common sense.

original: rnam par dbye ba 'di med do zhes bshad pa ni yang na zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba 'di med do zhes bshad pa ni yang na zhes smos so //
translated: In dependence upon valid cognition, the author says, there is no such distinction, and he adds the phrase or else.

original: brjod pa ni rjod byed de smra bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni rjod byed de smra bar byed pa'o //
translated: The term expression refers to the means of expression, that is, to speech.

original: brda la ltos nas khyad par can gyi don dam par byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi ngag gang yin pa de nyid ni rig @248b byed kyi yang yin no //üîΩdes na rig byed la yang byed pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: brda la ltos nas khyad par can gyi don dam par byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi ngag gang yin pa de nyid ni rig @248b byed kyi yang yin no // des na rig byed la yang byed pa yod pa yin te /
translated: In dependence upon conventional symbols, the speech of the world is the ultimate means of expression, and it is also the means of expressing the Vedas.

original: tshad ma la ltos gzhon nu 'byung ba can la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: tshad ma la ltos gzhon nu 'byung ba can la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, the Vedas also have an author, just like the Origin of Youth and other works.

original: khyab pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: khyab pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this pervasion established?

original: rigs gang gang las zhes bya ba'i tshul zhes gsungs so //üîΩbrjod dka' ba dang mnyan dka' ba la sogs pa dang / dug sel bar byed pa la sogs pa'i nus pa'i khyad par ram /
analyzed: rigs gang gang las zhes bya ba'i tshul zhes gsungs so // brjod dka' ba dang mnyan dka' ba la sogs pa dang / dug sel bar byed pa la sogs pa'i nus pa'i khyad par ram /
translated: The method of from which family? is stated.

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i don ston par byed pa la sogs pa rigs mi gcig par brtag par bya ba gang yin pa de dag kyang thams cad dang thun mong ba nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i don ston par byed pa la sogs pa rigs mi gcig par brtag par bya ba gang yin pa de dag kyang thams cad dang thun mong ba nyid do //
translated: The special ability to remove poison, etc., or to teach the meaning beyond the senses, etc., which is to be examined as not of the same kind, is also common to all.

original: de la ltos nas bshad pa ni yang na de dang khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la ltos nas bshad pa ni yang na de dang khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The explanation in dependence on that is or else, because there is no difference from that, etc.

original: rig byed dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig byed dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference from the Veda.

original: de lta yin dang tshig so sor nges pa'i tshad ma med pas na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang tshig so sor nges pa'i tshad ma med pas na /
translated: If that were so, because there would be no valid cognition of individual words,

original: rig byed kyi tshad ma 'ba' zhig tshad mar khas mi blang ngo snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rig byed kyi tshad ma 'ba' zhig tshad mar khas mi blang ngo snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: it is thought that only the valid cognition of the Veda would not be accepted as valid.

original: skyes bus byas pas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis dogs pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bus byas pas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis dogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase because it is human-made is another doubt.

original: khyab 'jug gi lung la sogs pa ni skyes bus byas par grags pas na /
analyzed: khyab 'jug gi lung la sogs pa ni skyes bus byas par grags pas na /
translated: The Vedas, etc., are known to be composed by persons.

original: de ni skyes bus ma byas pa la gnod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ni skyes bus ma byas pa la gnod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Therefore, they are invalidated by the fact that they are not composed by persons.

original: skyes bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sun 'byin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sun 'byin par byed pa'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúby a person‚Äù and so on are the refutation.

original: rig byed la yang ma rtogs pa'i phyir na skyes bus byas pa ma yin no zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: rig byed la yang ma rtogs pa'i phyir na skyes bus byas pa ma yin no zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: It should not be said that the Vedas, etc., are not composed by persons because they are not understood,

original: 'das nas shin tu yun ring du lon nas dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ma dmigs kyang byed pa po dgag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das nas shin tu yun ring du lon nas dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ma dmigs kyang byed pa po dgag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even though they are not perceived due to the passage of a very long time and the transcendence of the senses, the negation of the author is not possible.

original: des na byed pa po med pa nyid the tshom za'o //
analyzed: des na byed pa po med pa nyid the tshom za'o //
translated: Therefore, the nonexistence of the author is doubted.

original: de nyid kyi phyir skyes bus byas pa de skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyi gnod byed ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di tshad ma ga las yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skyes bus byas pa de skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyi gnod byed ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di tshad ma ga las yin te /
translated: Therefore, how is it that the Vedas, etc., which are composed by persons, are not invalidated by the fact that they are not composed by persons?

original: tshad ma 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshad ma 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning: no valid cognition exists at all.

original: rtsod pa 'di ni le'u dang por spros pa yin la /
analyzed: rtsod pa 'di ni le'u dang por spros pa yin la /
translated: This dispute has been elaborated in the first chapter.

original: 'dir ni skabs kyis cung zad brjod par zad do //
analyzed: 'dir ni skabs kyis cung zad brjod par zad do //
translated: Here, it is merely mentioned in passing.

original: phyogs gzhan brjod pa ni yang na zhes bya pa'o ;
analyzed: phyogs gzhan brjod pa ni yang na zhes bya pa'o ;
translated: The expression ‚Äúalternatively‚Äù introduces another point of view.

original: / tshig de ni zhes bya ba ni gang la byed pa po yod par grags pa'o //
analyzed: / tshig de ni zhes bya ba ni gang la byed pa po yod par grags pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin that passage‚Äù refers to the passage that states that an agent is known to exist when its activity is known.

original: gang gis 'di ltar brjod pa rang gis ma byas par bdag gis byas so snyam par 'khrul pa mthong ba yod dam snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: gang gis 'di ltar brjod pa rang gis ma byas par bdag gis byas so snyam par 'khrul pa mthong ba yod dam snyam du dogs na /
translated: If you suspect that someone might think that the error of saying ‚ÄúI did it‚Äù occurs when one does not do something oneself,üîΩthe response to that is ‚ÄúIt is not the case that the error of saying ‚ÄòI did it‚Äô occurs when one does not do something oneself.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúsomeone who is conceited‚Äù refers to

original: rlom par 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig gi //
analyzed: rlom par 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig gi //
translated: someone who is conceited about his or her own actions.

original: @249a * // rlom pa'i rnam pa smras pa ni nga yis byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @249a * // rlom pa'i rnam pa smras pa ni nga yis byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúin the form of conceit‚Äù refers to the conceit that ‚ÄúI did it.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir rlom par 'gyur zhes dogs na gtan tshigs brjod pa ni dran pa nyams phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rlom par 'gyur zhes dogs na gtan tshigs brjod pa ni dran pa nyams phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you suspect that someone might ask, ‚ÄúWhy is there conceit?‚Äù the reason is stated: ‚Äúbecause memory is impaired.‚Äù

original: 'dis sngar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gzhung nyid la dran pa nyams pas de ltar rlom pa yin no zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis sngar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gzhung nyid la dran pa nyams pas de ltar rlom pa yin no zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: This is the thought: ‚ÄúHe is conceited because of the loss of memory of the very scripture that he previously experienced.‚Äù

original: de ltar rig byed du mi 'dod lung yang skyes bus ma byas par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rig byed du mi 'dod lung yang skyes bus ma byas par bstan nas /
translated: Having thus shown that the Veda is not accepted as a means of valid knowledge and that the scriptures are not the work of a person,

original: gzhon nu 'byung ba la sogs pa yang skyes bus ma byas par sgrub par byed pa ni /
analyzed: gzhon nu 'byung ba la sogs pa yang skyes bus ma byas par sgrub par byed pa ni /
translated: he proves that the PurƒÅ·πáas, etc. are also not the work of a person.

original: snyan dngags kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snyan dngags kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: [He says,] ‚ÄúPoetry, etc.‚Äù

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni skyes bus byas par nges pa med na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni skyes bus byas par nges pa med na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf that is so‚Äù means if it is not certain that [the PurƒÅ·πáas, etc.] are the work of a person.

original: 'dir skabs kyi don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir skabs kyi don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of the present context is this.

original: rig byed las gzhan pa'i lung byed pa po sgrub na byed pa po'i tshig nyi tshe ba yin par brtag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rig byed las gzhan pa'i lung byed pa po sgrub na byed pa po'i tshig nyi tshe ba yin par brtag par bya ba yin no //
translated: If one proves that the author of the scriptures other than the Veda is a person, then the word ‚Äúauthor‚Äù should be understood to have a limited sense.

original: gal te rang gis bya bar ston par byed pa po ma yin na ni de'i tshe de la yang 'dir ni sngar yod pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te rang gis bya bar ston par byed pa po ma yin na ni de'i tshe de la yang 'dir ni sngar yod pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: If it is not the author who teaches what is to be done, then at that time it is only something that existed previously.

original: 'di lung byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di la nges pa ga la yod /
analyzed: 'di lung byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di la nges pa ga la yod /
translated: But how can one be certain that this is not a scripture composed by a human?

original: des na byed pa po'i tshig kyang ci bden pa yin nam /
analyzed: des na byed pa po'i tshig kyang ci bden pa yin nam /
translated: So, is the statement of the author true?

original: yang na ci gna' nyid du gnas pa'i lung la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can rmongs pas rang gis byas par brjod ces 'dir yang nges pa med do ;
analyzed: yang na ci gna' nyid du gnas pa'i lung la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can rmongs pas rang gis byas par brjod ces 'dir yang nges pa med do ;
translated: Or, is it that the ignorant, who are by nature devoted to ancient scriptures, say that it was composed by themselves? In this case, too, there is no certainty.

original: / des na thams cad skyes bus ma byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / des na thams cad skyes bus ma byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, all scriptures are not composed by humans.

original: gzhan gyis de ltar yin na zhes smras te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis de ltar yin na zhes smras te /
translated: Others say, ‚ÄúIf that is so, then . . .

original: thams cad skyes bus ma byas pa yin na'o //
analyzed: thams cad skyes bus ma byas pa yin na'o //
translated: . . . all scriptures are not composed by humans.‚Äù

original: lung 'di ni khyab 'jug gis byas so zhes byed pa po brjod pa dogs pa med par 'gyur ba des na byed pa po ston par byed pa mi brjod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: lung 'di ni khyab 'jug gis byas so zhes byed pa po brjod pa dogs pa med par 'gyur ba des na byed pa po ston par byed pa mi brjod par 'gyur na /
translated: The statement of the author of this scripture is not doubted, since it is said that Vishnu composed it. Therefore, the statement of the author would not be omitted,

original: brjod pa yang yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa yang yin no //
translated: but it is stated.

original: des na khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i lung de la skyes bus ma byas pa nyid don med de /
analyzed: des na khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i lung de la skyes bus ma byas pa nyid don med de /
translated: Therefore, the fact that the scriptures of Vishnu and so on are not composed by humans is meaningless.

original: brjod par bya ba dang bral ba brdzun yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang bral ba brdzun yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is: it is false, because it is devoid of what is to be expressed.

original: sun 'byin pa ni rig byed la'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa ni rig byed la'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The refutation is: Even in the Vedas, etc.

original: de don med pa nyid mthong zhes bya ba ni ri bo rig la ni rig gi rig byed byas la /
analyzed: de don med pa nyid mthong zhes bya ba ni ri bo rig la ni rig gi rig byed byas la /
translated: Seeing that they are meaningless means that the Vedas were composed by the sage ParƒÅ≈õara,

original: snga ma bya'i rig byed ni ri bo s'a la la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma bya'i rig byed ni ri bo s'a la la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and the Vedas of the past were composed by the sage B·πõhaspati, etc.

original: 'on te der ni don gzhan kho na yin te /üîΩbyas zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin no zhe na de lta yin na gnyi ga la yang mtshungs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te der ni don gzhan kho na yin te / byas zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin no zhe na de lta yin na gnyi ga la yang mtshungs par 'gyur te /
translated: But if it is said that there is another meaning there,üîΩand 'composed' is the explanation, then that is the same for both.

original: 'dri yang khyab 'jug gis @249b byas zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba don nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dri yang khyab 'jug gis @249b byas zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba don nyid yin no //
translated: The meaning is: Vi·π£·πáu composed the Vedas, and 'composed' is the explanation.

original: tshig tha ma 'grel pa ni don med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshig tha ma 'grel pa ni don med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The commentary on the last line is meaningless, etc.

original: don gzhan du rtogs na zhes bya ba 'di lan btab zin mod kyi lhag pa brjod pa'i don du rjes su brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan du rtogs na zhes bya ba 'di lan btab zin mod kyi lhag pa brjod pa'i don du rjes su brjod pa yin no //
translated: Although the response to if it is understood in another sense has already been given, it is restated for the purpose of additional explanation.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni bden pa'i don du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //üîΩrig byed der lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtsub shing la sogs pa bden pa'i don du rtogs pa ni 'chad par byed pa'i skyes bus bya ba kho na'o //üîΩdang por mi bden par snang ba gang yin pa lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ni rig byed las yin na des na rig byed ni tshad ma ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni bden pa'i don du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // rig byed der lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtsub shing la sogs pa bden pa'i don du rtogs pa ni 'chad par byed pa'i skyes bus bya ba kho na'o // dang por mi bden par snang ba gang yin pa lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ni rig byed las yin na des na rig byed ni tshad ma ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of that is stated by ‚Äúin the sense of truth,‚Äù and so on.üîΩThe explanation of the meaning of the Vedic statement ‚Äúthe goddess,‚Äù and so on, is the work of a person who is a commentator.üîΩThe meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe goddess,‚Äù and so on, is not true, but is a mere appearance. Therefore, the meaning of the Vedic statement is not a valid cognition.

original: rnam 'grel gyi don bshad pa ni lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rig byed kyi don lha'i khyad par la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs nas dgang gzar la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don gang skyes bus byas pa'i don de la sgra ni don gyi deüîΩnyid kyi rgyu mtshan can gyi tshad ma ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: rnam 'grel gyi don bshad pa ni lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rig byed kyi don lha'i khyad par la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs nas dgang gzar la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don gang skyes bus byas pa'i don de la sgra ni don gyi deüîΩnyid kyi rgyu mtshan can gyi tshad ma ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: The meaning of the PramƒÅ·πáavarttika is as follows: The meaning of the Vedic statement ‚Äúthe goddess,‚Äù and so on, is not the meaning of the characteristics of the particular deity, and so on, but is the meaning of the characteristics of the ladle, and so on. The meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe goddess,‚Äù and so on, is the meaning of the characteristics of the ladle, and so on, which is the work of a person. The sound of the Vedic statement is not a valid cognition that is a reason for the reality of the meaning of the characteristics of the ladle, and so on.

original: bshad zin pa'i don nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /üîΩ'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i don nyid gsal bar byed pa ni / 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The following verse is stated to clarify the meaning that has been explained.

original: de blo ni skyes bu'i blo tshad mar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de blo ni skyes bu'i blo tshad mar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthus‚Äù and so forth is that the understanding of that is the valid cognition of a person.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni skyes bus brtags pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni skyes bus brtags pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to what is imagined by a person.

original: gal te de yang de don na //
analyzed: gal te de yang de don na //
translated: If that also has that meaning,

original: zhes bya ba ni dang po yang rig byed kyi don yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dang po yang rig byed kyi don yin no //
translated: the meaning of the Vedas is also the meaning of the first.

original: ci'i phyir rig byed don med min te brdzun pa'i don can yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩde lta na yang zhes bya ba ni ci de'i tshe nyid ci ltar snang ba 'di nyid don yin nam /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rig byed don med min te brdzun pa'i don can yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni ci de'i tshe nyid ci ltar snang ba 'di nyid don yin nam /
translated: Why is the meaning of the Vedas not meaningless? It has a false meaning, is what is meant.üîΩEven so, at that time, is the meaning of the Vedas just what appears to us, or is it something else that does not appear to us?

original: 'on te bdag cag la mi snang ba yin yang gzhan kho na zhig yin zhes gzhan du yang the tshom za'o //
analyzed: 'on te bdag cag la mi snang ba yin yang gzhan kho na zhig yin zhes gzhan du yang the tshom za'o //
translated: Thus, even in regard to something else, there is doubt.

original: des na the tshom za bas skyes bus ma byas kyang tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: des na the tshom za bas skyes bus ma byas kyang tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even if it is not produced by a person, it is not a valid cognition because it is doubtful.

original: gal te ji ltar the tshom ma za zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar the tshom ma za zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how there is doubt,

original: rig byed kyi don gyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rig byed kyi don gyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: the meaning of the Vedas is not understood.

original: gal te gang du dang po pa mi srid pa der the tshom du 'gyur mod gang du don dang por srid pa der go ci ltar the tshom za zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gang du dang po pa mi srid pa der the tshom du 'gyur mod gang du don dang por srid pa der go ci ltar the tshom za zhe na /
translated: If doubt is impossible for one who has not previously had doubt, then how can doubt arise for one who has not previously had doubt?

original: phyugs 'dod pas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: phyugs 'dod pas zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because of the desire for cattle.

original: res 'ga' tsi tra'i mchod sbyin byas kyang phyugs phun sum tshogs pa ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' tsi tra'i mchod sbyin byas kyang phyugs phun sum tshogs pa ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sometimes, even though one performs the sacrifice of Citra, one does not obtain excellent cattle.

original: gzhan gyi dogs pa ni der las nyams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa @250a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dogs pa ni der las nyams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa @250a * //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs doubt is expressed in the words, ‚ÄúThere is the statement. . .

original: yin no // der zhes bya ba ni tsi tras mchod sbyin byas par ro //
analyzed: yin no // der zhes bya ba ni tsi tras mchod sbyin byas par ro //
translated: ‚Äù There means in the sacrifice of Citra.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma 'gog pa'o //üîΩtshad ma med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ci 'dir las nyams pas ma grub pa'am /
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma 'gog pa'o // tshad ma med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ci 'dir las nyams pas ma grub pa'am /
translated: No, is the reply, refuting the opponent‚Äôs position.üîΩBecause there is no valid cognition is the reason.

original: 'on te tsi tra'i mchod sbyin la nus pa med pas yin zhes 'di la tshad ma med do //
analyzed: 'on te tsi tra'i mchod sbyin la nus pa med pas yin zhes 'di la tshad ma med do //
translated: There is no valid cognition to determine whether the failure is due to the weakness of the karma or to the incapacity of the sacrifice of Citra.

original: res 'ga' nus pa mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: res 'ga' nus pa mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that sometimes one sees the capacity,

original: de'i tshe ci las kyi khyad par yongs su sbyin pa las sam /
analyzed: de'i tshe ci las kyi khyad par yongs su sbyin pa las sam /
translated: then at that time, is it due to the perfection of the karma or to the capacity of the sacrifice?

original: 'on te tsi tra'i mchod sbyin gyis nus pa yin zhes rtogs par dka' ba'o snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te tsi tra'i mchod sbyin gyis nus pa yin zhes rtogs par dka' ba'o snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: But if it is Citra's sacrifice that is able to do it? It is difficult to understand.

original: 'on te der ni don gzhan kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'on te der ni don gzhan kho na yin te /
translated: But if you think, In that case, it is something else that is the meaning,

original: tsi tra'i mchod sbyin nus pa ni ma yin no snyam na don gzhan rtogs pa ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: tsi tra'i mchod sbyin nus pa ni ma yin no snyam na don gzhan rtogs pa ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: and it is not Citra's sacrifice that is able to do it, then the statement The understanding of something else as the meaning is made.

original: de ltar don gzhan rtogs pa skyes bus byas par 'gyur mod //
analyzed: de ltar don gzhan rtogs pa skyes bus byas par 'gyur mod //
translated: Thus, the arising of the understanding of something else would be created by a person.

original: sbyin sreg gis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa nges par sbyor ba rtogs pa go de ltar ci ste 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: sbyin sreg gis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa nges par sbyor ba rtogs pa go de ltar ci ste 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how could the statement By the sacrifice, destroy! and so on be connected to the understanding?

original: rig byed las bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: rig byed las bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: To explain this, he says From the Veda, the self... and so on.

original: gang gi phyir sbyin sreg gis shig ces zer ba'i rig byed las bdag nyid nges par sbyar ro snyam pa'i 'jig rten thams cad ni brda'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin pas de'i phyir sbyin sreg gis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa zer ba'i rig byed du nges
analyzed: gang gi phyir sbyin sreg gis shig ces zer ba'i rig byed las bdag nyid nges par sbyar ro snyam pa'i 'jig rten thams cad ni brda'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin pas de'i phyir sbyin sreg gis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa zer ba'i rig byed du nges
translated: Because the entire world thinks, From the statement 'By the sacrifice, destroy!' the self is connected to the Veda, and because it follows convention, therefore the statement 'By the sacrifice, destroy!' and so on is connected to the Veda.

original: par sbyor ba nyid du rtogs pa ni skyes bus byas pa kho na'o //
analyzed: par sbyor ba nyid du rtogs pa ni skyes bus byas pa kho na'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir na rtogs pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa kho na'o snyam du dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na rtogs pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa kho na'o snyam du dgos pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the purpose of this understanding is that it is only without an object.

original: de ltar dngos po'i nyes pa yang bstan nas sgra'i tha snyad kyi nyes pa yang ston pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po'i nyes pa yang bstan nas sgra'i tha snyad kyi nyes pa yang ston pa ni /
translated: Having thus shown the fault of the entity, he shows the fault of the verbal convention.

original: nges par sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the affix, etc.

original: nges 'byor ngag gi don yin pa la yang nyes pa 'di 'di mtshungs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba'i sgrar byas nas gsungs so //
analyzed: nges 'byor ngag gi don yin pa la yang nyes pa 'di 'di mtshungs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir nges par sbyor ba'i sgrar byas nas gsungs so //
translated: In order to show that this fault is the same even in the case of the meaning of the affix, he states it having made the affix the word.

original: don gyi bsgoms pa'i phyogs la yang de bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: don gyi bsgoms pa'i phyogs la yang de bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to understand it in the same way in the case of the side of the meaning of the affix, he states and so on.

original: kyang gi sgra ni rim pa gzhan du yin te /
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni rim pa gzhan du yin te /

original: 'tshed do zhes bya bas kyang byed pa po rtogs so zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'tshed do zhes bya bas kyang byed pa po rtogs so zhes bya ba yin no //

original: de nyid kyi phyir byed pa po'i gsum par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir byed pa po'i gsum par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the third case of the agent is not used.

original: skyes bu'i bya ba tsam rtogs na ni byed pa po ma brjod pa'i phyir gsum pa zlog tu med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyes bu'i bya ba tsam rtogs na ni byed pa po ma brjod pa'i phyir gsum pa zlog tu med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the mere action of the person is understood, then the third case of the agent is unavoidable, because the agent is not expressed. This is the meaning.

original: gzhan @250b gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni //
analyzed: gzhan @250b gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni //
translated: Anticipating another‚Äôs doubt, he says

original: byed pa'i shugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa'i shugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the force of the action‚Äù and so on.

original: 'tshed do zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'tshed do zhes bya ba /
translated: ‚ÄúHe cooks‚Äù

original: 'dir dang po ni skyes bu'i byed pa rtogs so //
analyzed: 'dir dang po ni skyes bu'i byed pa rtogs so //
translated: Here, first the action of the person is understood.

original: byed mkhan de'i shugs kyis 'phangs pa yin pas de na byed pa po rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: byed mkhan de'i shugs kyis 'phangs pa yin pas de na byed pa po rtogs so zhe na /
translated: Since that is implied by the force of the action, the agent is understood there.

original: lan du byed pa po 'phangs pas rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lan du byed pa po 'phangs pas rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúThe agent is not understood by implication.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir brjod ma thag pa'i tshul de ltar yin na rim gyis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir brjod ma thag pa'i tshul de ltar yin na rim gyis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because, if it were as just explained, then it would be understood in sequence.

original: rim gyis rtogs pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: rim gyis rtogs pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: To make it clear that it is understood in sequence, he says

original: dang po sgom pa rtogs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dang po sgom pa rtogs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFirst the meditation is understood‚Äù and so on.

original: dang po skyes bu'i byed pa rtogs par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: dang po skyes bu'i byed pa rtogs par 'gyur ro//
translated: First, one understands the activity of the person.

original: de'i shugs kyis zhes bya bsgom pa'i shugs kyis so //
analyzed: de'i shugs kyis zhes bya bsgom pa'i shugs kyis so //
translated: By the force of that, by the force of meditation.

original: phyis zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu'o //

original: de las zhes bya ba ni sgom pa rtogs pa las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni sgom pa rtogs pa las so //
translated: From that, from the understanding of meditation.

original: de ltar rim gyi rtogs la rag mod nyes pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de ltar rim gyi rtogs la rag mod nyes pa ci yod ce na /
translated: If one must understand in stages, what is the problem?

original: rim gyis nyes pa rtogs par ni zhes gsungs so //üîΩde ltar rim gyis rtogs pa nyams su myong bas gnod do zhes bstan nas /
analyzed: rim gyis nyes pa rtogs par ni zhes gsungs so // de ltar rim gyis rtogs pa nyams su myong bas gnod do zhes bstan nas /
translated: The problem is understood in stages.üîΩHaving shown that the understanding in stages is contradicted by experience,

original: sgra'i skyon yang ston pa ni gnyis kyi tshig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sgra'i skyon yang ston pa ni gnyis kyi tshig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: he shows the problem with the words:

original: g-yos mkhan 'tshed par byed do //
analyzed: g-yos mkhan 'tshed par byed do //
translated: The cook cooks.

original: g-yos mkhan 'tshed par byed pa dag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yos mkhan 'tshed par byed pa dag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The cooks cook.

original: bya ba gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because of the single action.

original: bya ba ni rdzas ma yin pa'i phyir na gnyis dang mang po nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: bya ba ni rdzas ma yin pa'i phyir na gnyis dang mang po nyid du mi rigs so //

original: gcig nyid ni tha snyad tsam du yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid ni tha snyad tsam du yin no //
